Class LinearFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • albus.predictor.function.LinearFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<Predictor>, Writable, UnivariateFunction, Predictor, Regressor

extends Object
implements Regressor, UnivariateFunction
    Class for linear functions.
